p: For neutralization and HI assays, sera were treated with RDE of Vibrio cholerae (Denka Seiken, Chuo-ku, Tokyo, Japan) according to manufacturer’s instructions. RDE-treated serum samples were then treated with three volumes (based on original serum volume) of 2.5% sodium citrate solution and then incubated at 56 °C for 30 min. Three volumes of PBS (based on original serum volume) were added to each sample for a final dilution of 1:10.
